songs.title: Water
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

[Intro]
You're so [?] and I [?]
So, so [?] that's so [?]
[?]

[Chorus: Ant Clemons]
When I [?] the windest wind
Take the chlorine out of conversation
Let Your light reflect on me
I promise I'm not hiding anything
It's water
We are water
Purest water
Like a newborn daughter

[Verse 1: Ant Clemons]
The storm may come
But we'll get through it because of Your love
Either way, we crash like water
Your love's water
Purest water, we are water

[Verse 2: Kanye West]
Jesus flow through us
Jesus heal the bruises
Jesus cue the music
Jesus please choose us
Jesus, please help
Jesus, please heal
Jesus, please forgive
Jesus, please reveal
Jesus, give us strength
Jesus, make us well
Jesus, help us live
Jesus, give us wealth
Jesus is our savior
Jesus is our rock
Jesus keep us safe
Jesus give us grace

[Chorus: Ant Clemons]
When I [?] the windest wind
Take the chlorine out of conversation
Let your light reflect on me
I promise I'm not hiding anything
It's water
We are water
Purest water
Like a newborn daughter

[Outro]
You're so [?] and I [?]
So, so [?] that's so [?]
[?]




I know I might not be as perfect as Christ
But, we're made up of 90 percent water
